author: bensonhedges9294
content: Hi guys, I am obviously in the wrong place but need help working out what's going on with my EL / CL pair. I'm running teku / besu but am not sure where their discord is. Basically my CL to EL connection keeps timing out and reconnecting.

content: Could anyone point in the direction of the right place to ask?
